dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, big news that broke, like, late last week, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, big news that broke, like, late last week, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, the US airstrike in Baghdad, killing General Qassem Soleimani. That was, like, a massive development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, the U S airstrike in Baghdad, killing General Qassem Soleimani. That was, like, a massive development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Major General Qassem Soleimani, one of Irans top military leaders, was killed in a drone strike at Baghdad International Airport on Thursday night, the Pentagon confirmed, sparking strong condemnations from the Iranian governmentwho vowed to retaliate for the action.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for sure. And, you know, we saw the immediate fallout, globally. Stock markets, um, they really pulled back from their strong start to the new year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for sure. And, you know, we saw the immediate fallout, globally. Stock markets, um, they really pulled back from their strong start to the new year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global stock markets pulled back from their strong start to the new year and oil prices surged on Friday, following an overnight U.S. airstrike that killed Irans most senior general and significantly inflamed tensions in the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Like, the S&P 500 was down almost 0.7%, Dow nearly 250 points. Even European markets, the Stoxx 600, that was down too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Like, the S and P five hundred was down almost zero point seven percent, Dow nearly two hundred fifty points. Even European markets, the Stoxx six hundred, that was down too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: U.S. stocks plunged on Friday following the news, with the S&P 500 down almost 0.7% and the Dow down nearly 250 points, or 0.8%, in morning trading. The escalating tensions between the U.S. and Iran also weighed on other global stock markets: The Stoxx Europe 600 fell by 0.4% and Hong Kongs Hang Seng index was down 0.3%, for example.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But then, on the flip side, oil prices, *whoa*. They just surged. Over 4%, hitting like an 8-month high, near 70 bucks a barrel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then, on the flip side, oil prices, whoa. They just surged. Over four percent, hitting like an eight-month high, near seventy bucks a barrel.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While stocks retreated from their early 2020 rally, oil prices surged more than 4%, hitting an 8-month high of almost $70 per barrel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, that was the big one, wasn't it? And, uh, it's pretty clear why. Analysts are worried about Iran retaliating, potentially targeting, you know, oil infrastructure belonging to US allies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that was the big one, wasn't it? And, uh, it's pretty clear why. Analysts are worried about Iran retaliating, potentially targeting, you know, oil infrastructure belonging to U S allies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Analysts are concerned that the U.S. airstrikes will lead Iran to retaliate by attacking oil infrastructure of U.S. allies in the Middle East, like Saudi Arabia, according to CNBC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Like, if they hit Saudi Arabia's facilities, that would totally disrupt global supply chains.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Like, if they hit Saudi Arabia's facilities, that would totally disrupt global supply chains.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such a retaliation would disrupt global oil supply chains and likely also send the prices oil skyrocketing further.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And just send prices absolutely skyrocketing further.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And just send prices absolutely skyrocketing further.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such a retaliation would disrupt global oil supply chains and likely also send the prices oil skyrocketing further.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, for context, Soleimani, he wasn't just *any* general, right? He was, uh, one of Iran's top military leaders, head of the Revolutionary Guard's foreign wing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, for context, Soleimani, he wasn't just any general, right? He was, uh, one of Iran's top military leaders, head of the Revolutionary Guard's foreign wing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump ordered the strike that killed Soleimani, the leader of Irans Islamic Revolutionary Guards foreign wingdesignated a terrorist organization by the U.S. government, late on Thursday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, which the US has designated as a terrorist organization. And this strike, it was, like, a response to those Iran-backed militias attacking the US embassy in Baghdad on New Year's Eve.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, which the U S has designated as a terrorist organization. And this strike, it was, like, a response to those Iran-backed militias attacking the U S embassy in Baghdad on New Year's Eve.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This latest action by the Pentagon comes as a response to a New Years Eve attack by Iran-backed militias on the U.S. embassy in Baghdad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And Iran's foreign minister, I mean, he's already called it an "extremely dangerous and foolish escalation" and vowed retaliation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And Iran's foreign minister, I mean, he's already called it an extremely dangerous and foolish escalation and vowed retaliation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Iran harshly condemned the airstrikes and vowed to retaliate: Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif said on Twitter that the U.S. bears responsibility for what he called an extremely dangerous and foolish escalation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is why, uh, Adam Crisafulli from Vital Knowledge, he was saying this isn't just your usual knee-jerk market reaction to geopolitics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is why, uh, Adam Crisafulli from Vital Knowledge, he was saying this isn't just your usual knee-jerk market reaction to geopolitics.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the markets usual knee-jerk reactions to geopolitical shocks tend to fade, this particular development is different than the others, Adam Crisafulli, founder of Vital Knowledge, said in a note on Friday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he called it "the most consequential decision made by Trump thus far." And, like, with the S&P 500's already high valuation, it doesn't have much room to absorb bad news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he called it the most consequential decision made by Trump thus far. And, like, with the S and P five hundred's already high valuation, it doesn't have much room to absorb bad news.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Striking Soleimani is the most consequential decision made by Trump thus far, while the S&P 500s high valuation multiple doesnt leave it with much capacity to absorb bad news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, you know, pretty unsettling. Especially with the US embassy issuing that security alert, telling all American citizens to leave Iraq immediately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, you know, pretty unsettling. Especially with the U S embassy issuing that security alert, telling all American citizens to leave Iraq immediately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amid the promises of Iranian retaliation, the U.S. embassy issued a security alert on Friday urging all American citizens to depart Iraq immediately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a very tense situation, um, to say the least.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a very tense situation, um, to say the least.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely one to keep a close eye on in the coming weeks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely one to keep a close eye on in the coming weeks.
